### Checklist

**Code Quality:**
- [ ] I have followed the TypeScript strict mode guidelines
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding style
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary

**Testing:**
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] Test coverage meets the 80% threshold

**Documentation:**
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

**Content Guidelines (if applicable):**
- [ ] New content distinguishes between historical facts and theoretical concepts
- [ ] AI-generated content is clearly labeled
- [ ] All source links are verified and accessible
- [ ] Appropriate disclaimers are included
- [ ] No claims that theoretical systems are operational

### Commit Convention
<!-- Use the following format for commits -->
```
feat(agent-N): Description
fix(agent-N): Description
docs(agent-N): Description
test(agent-N): Description
refactor(agent-N): Description
```
